ROOT.ds55:
select A.num,A.sgnum as sgnum1,B.sgnum as sgnum2 from (
select rownum as num,SGNUM from ( select B.dayid,isnull(sgnum,0) as SGNUM from ( SELECT "STA_DAY" as dayid,SUM("ACCID_NUM") AS SGNUM FROM "SG_THEME"."SG_RPT_DSC_S_ALARMINFONUM" WHERE STA_DAY>=substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01 00:00:00' AND STA_DAY<=substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-12-31 23:59:59' AND DATASOURCE_ID={0} GROUP BY STA_DAY ) A right join ( select dayid from ( SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), ROWNUM - 1),'YYYY-MM-dd') dayid FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= dayS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-12-31', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) + 1 ) ) B on A.dayid = B.dayid order by b.dayid ) ) A left join ( select rownum as num,SGNUM from ( select B.dayid,isnull(sgnum,0) as SGNUM from ( SELECT "STA_DAY" as dayid,SUM("ACCID_NUM") AS SGNUM FROM "SG_THEME"."SG_RPT_DSC_S_ALARMINFONUM" WHERE STA_DAY>=substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-01-01 00:00:00' AND STA_DAY<=substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-12-31 23:59:59' AND DATASOURCE_ID={0} GROUP BY STA_DAY ) A right join ( select dayid from ( SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), ROWNUM - 1),'YYYY-MM-dd') dayid FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= dayS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE(substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-12-31', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), TO_DATE(substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) + 1 ) ) B on A.dayid = B.dayid order by b.dayid ) ) B on A.num = B.num
ROOT.ds68:
select A.num,A.sgnum as sgnum1,B.sgnum as sgnum2 from (
select rownum as num,SGNUM from ( select B.dayid,isnull(sgnum,0) as SGNUM from ( SELECT "STA_DAY" as dayid,SUM("LIMIT_NUM") AS SGNUM FROM "SG_THEME"."SG_RPT_DSC_S_ALARMINFONUM" WHERE STA_DAY>=substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01 00:00:00' AND STA_DAY<=substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-12-31 23:59:59' AND DATASOURCE_ID={0} GROUP BY STA_DAY ) A right join ( select dayid from ( SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), ROWNUM - 1),'YYYY-MM-dd') dayid FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= dayS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-12-31', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) + 1 ) ) B on A.dayid = B.dayid order by b.dayid ) ) A left join ( select rownum as num,SGNUM from ( select B.dayid,isnull(sgnum,0) as SGNUM from ( SELECT "STA_DAY" as dayid,SUM("LIMIT_NUM") AS SGNUM FROM "SG_THEME"."SG_RPT_DSC_S_ALARMINFONUM" WHERE STA_DAY>=substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-01-01 00:00:00' AND STA_DAY<=substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-12-31 23:59:59' AND DATASOURCE_ID={0} GROUP BY STA_DAY ) A right join ( select dayid from ( SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), ROWNUM - 1),'YYYY-MM-dd') dayid FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= dayS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE(substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-12-31', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), TO_DATE(substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) + 1 ) ) B on A.dayid = B.dayid order by b.dayid ) ) B on A.num = B.num
ROOT.dsBW:
select A.num,A.sgnum as sgnum1,B.sgnum as sgnum2 from (
select rownum as num,SGNUM from ( select B.dayid,isnull(sgnum,0) as SGNUM from ( SELECT "STA_DAY" as dayid,SUM("VARBIT_NUM") AS SGNUM FROM "SG_THEME"."SG_RPT_DSC_S_ALARMINFONUM" WHERE STA_DAY>=substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01 00:00:00' AND STA_DAY<=substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-12-31 23:59:59' AND DATASOURCE_ID={0} GROUP BY STA_DAY ) A right join ( select dayid from ( SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), ROWNUM - 1),'YYYY-MM-dd') dayid FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= dayS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-12-31', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) + 1 ) ) B on A.dayid = B.dayid order by b.dayid ) ) A left join ( select rownum as num,SGNUM from ( select B.dayid,isnull(sgnum,0) as SGNUM from ( SELECT "STA_DAY" as dayid,SUM("VARBIT_NUM") AS SGNUM FROM "SG_THEME"."SG_RPT_DSC_S_ALARMINFONUM" WHERE STA_DAY>=substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-01-01 00:00:00' AND STA_DAY<=substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-12-31 23:59:59' AND DATASOURCE_ID={0} GROUP BY STA_DAY ) A right join ( select dayid from ( SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), ROWNUM - 1),'YYYY-MM-dd') dayid FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= dayS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE(substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-12-31', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), TO_DATE(substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) + 1 ) ) B on A.dayid = B.dayid order by b.dayid ) ) B on A.num = B.num
ROOT.dsGZ:
select A.num,A.sgnum as sgnum1,B.sgnum as sgnum2 from (
select rownum as num,SGNUM from ( select B.dayid,isnull(sgnum,0) as SGNUM from ( SELECT "STA_DAY" as dayid,SUM("INFORM_NUM") AS SGNUM FROM "SG_THEME"."SG_RPT_DSC_S_ALARMINFONUM" WHERE STA_DAY>=substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01 00:00:00' AND STA_DAY<=substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-12-31 23:59:59' AND DATASOURCE_ID={0} GROUP BY STA_DAY ) A right join ( select dayid from ( SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), ROWNUM - 1),'YYYY-MM-dd') dayid FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= dayS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-12-31', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) + 1 ) ) B on A.dayid = B.dayid order by b.dayid ) ) A left join ( select rownum as num,SGNUM from ( select B.dayid,isnull(sgnum,0) as SGNUM from ( SELECT "STA_DAY" as dayid,SUM("INFORM_NUM") AS SGNUM FROM "SG_THEME"."SG_RPT_DSC_S_ALARMINFONUM" WHERE STA_DAY>=substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-01-01 00:00:00' AND STA_DAY<=substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-12-31 23:59:59' AND DATASOURCE_ID={0} GROUP BY STA_DAY ) A right join ( select dayid from ( SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), ROWNUM - 1),'YYYY-MM-dd') dayid FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= dayS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE(substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-12-31', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), TO_DATE(substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) + 1 ) ) B on A.dayid = B.dayid order by b.dayid ) ) B on A.num = B.num
ROOT.ds72:
select A.num,A.sgnum as sgnum1,B.sgnum as sgnum2 from (
select rownum as num,SGNUM from ( select B.dayid,isnull(sgnum,0) as SGNUM from ( SELECT "STA_DAY" as dayid,SUM("EXC_NUM") AS SGNUM FROM "SG_THEME"."SG_RPT_DSC_S_ALARMINFONUM" WHERE STA_DAY>=substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01 00:00:00' AND STA_DAY<=substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-12-31 23:59:59' AND DATASOURCE_ID={0} GROUP BY STA_DAY ) A right join ( select dayid from ( SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), ROWNUM - 1),'YYYY-MM-dd') dayid FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= dayS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-12-31', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) + 1 ) ) B on A.dayid = B.dayid order by b.dayid ) ) A left join ( select rownum as num,SGNUM from ( select B.dayid,isnull(sgnum,0) as SGNUM from ( SELECT "STA_DAY" as dayid,SUM("EXC_NUM") AS SGNUM FROM "SG_THEME"."SG_RPT_DSC_S_ALARMINFONUM" WHERE STA_DAY>=substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-01-01 00:00:00' AND STA_DAY<=substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-12-31 23:59:59' AND DATASOURCE_ID={0} GROUP BY STA_DAY ) A right join ( select dayid from ( SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), ROWNUM - 1),'YYYY-MM-dd') dayid FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= dayS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE(substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-12-31', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), TO_DATE(substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) + 1 ) ) B on A.dayid = B.dayid order by b.dayid ) ) B on A.num = B.num
ROOT.ds76:
select C.num,C.SGNUM as SGNUM1,D.SGNUM as SGNUM2 from (
select rownum as num, isnull(SGNUM,0) as SGNUM from ( SELECT b.dayid,SGNUM from ( select "STA_DAY",SIGNALNUM AS SGNUM FROM "MONITORSIGNAL"."QJ_JKGJXX_QXTJ{{0}}" WHERE STA_DAY>=substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01 00:00:00' AND STA_DAY<=substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-12-31 23:59:59' AND QXLX = '频发缺陷' )A right join ( SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), ROWNUM - 1),'YYYY-MM-dd') dayid FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= dayS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-12-31', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) + 1 ) B on A."STA_DAY" = B.dayid ORDER BY b.dayid ) ) C left join ( select rownum as num, isnull(SGNUM,0) as SGNUM from ( SELECT b.dayid,SGNUM from ( select "STA_DAY",SIGNALNUM AS SGNUM FROM "MONITORSIGNAL"."QJ_JKGJXX_QXTJ{{0}}" WHERE STA_DAY>=substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-01-01 00:00:00' AND STA_DAY<=substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-12-31 23:59:59' AND QXLX = '频发缺陷' )A right join ( SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), ROWNUM - 1),'YYYY-MM-dd') dayid FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= dayS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE(substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-12-31', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), TO_DATE(substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) + 1 ) B on A."STA_DAY" = B.dayid ORDER BY b.dayid ) ) D on C.num = D.num
ROOT.ds80:
select C.num,C.SGNUM as SGNUM1,D.SGNUM as SGNUM2 from (
select rownum as num, isnull(SGNUM,0) as SGNUM from ( SELECT b.dayid,SGNUM from ( select "STA_DAY",SIGNALNUM AS SGNUM FROM "MONITORSIGNAL"."QJ_JKGJXX_QXTJ{{0}}" WHERE STA_DAY>=substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01 00:00:00' AND STA_DAY<=substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-12-31 23:59:59' AND QXLX = '误发信号' )A right join ( SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), ROWNUM - 1),'YYYY-MM-dd') dayid FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= dayS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-12-31', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) + 1 ) B on A."STA_DAY" = B.dayid ORDER BY b.dayid ) ) C left join ( select rownum as num, isnull(SGNUM,0) as SGNUM from ( SELECT b.dayid,SGNUM from ( select "STA_DAY",SIGNALNUM AS SGNUM FROM "MONITORSIGNAL"."QJ_JKGJXX_QXTJ{{0}}" WHERE STA_DAY>=substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-01-01 00:00:00' AND STA_DAY<=substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-12-31 23:59:59' AND QXLX = '误发信号' )A right join ( SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), ROWNUM - 1),'YYYY-MM-dd') dayid FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= dayS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE(substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-12-31', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), TO_DATE(substr(ADD_dayS(TO_DATE(substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-dd '), -1),0,4) || '-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) + 1 ) B on A."STA_DAY" = B.dayid ORDER BY b.dayid ) ) D on C.num = D.num
ROOT.ds42: select SUM(ACCID_NUM) AS accidnum, '事故' as wname from "SG_THEME"."SG_RPT_DSC_S_ALARMINFONUM" where STA_DAY between substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01 00:00:00' and substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-12-31 23:59:59' AND DATASOURCE_ID={0} union all select SUM(EXC_NUM) AS excnum, '异常' as wname from "SG_THEME"."SG_RPT_DSC_S_ALARMINFONUM" where STA_DAY between substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01 00:00:00' and substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-12-31 23:59:59' AND DATASOURCE_ID={0} union all select SUM(LIMIT_NUM) AS limitnum, '越限' as wname from "SG_THEME"."SG_RPT_DSC_S_ALARMINFONUM" where STA_DAY between substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01 00:00:00' and substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-12-31 23:59:59' AND DATASOURCE_ID={0} union all select SUM(VARBIT_NUM) AS varbitnum, '变位' as wname from "SG_THEME"."SG_RPT_DSC_S_ALARMINFONUM" where STA_DAY between substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01 00:00:00' and substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-12-31 23:59:59' AND DATASOURCE_ID={0} union all select SUM(INFORM_NUM) AS informnum, '告知' as wname from "SG_THEME"."SG_RPT_DSC_S_ALARMINFONUM" where STA_DAY between substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-01-01 00:00:00' and substr(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR'),0,4) || '-12-31 23:59:59' AND DATASOURCE_ID={0}
